title: Timescale Keeper/Burning Bandits
lyrics:
This song is the early version of “Exo-Politics”. It featured a middle-eastern extended introduction and the theme of the lyrics is focused on demons.
[Verse 1]
Open the skies over me
I am waiting patiently
I'll wait for the sign
Whisper through centuries
Secrets locked up lonely
And I'm waiting until
[Chorus 1]
Stop asking yourself why
You can't see the symbols in your eyes
Stop asking where to find
The truth to compensate your lies
[Refrain]
So it forms in my mind
I am searching for a twisting world
And there's no scars on my side
[Verse 2]
Stop asking yourself why
You can't see the symbols in your eyes
Stop asking, where to find
The truth to compensate your lies
[Chorus 2]
Well I'm waiting patiently
I’m waiting for a sign
Well I’m waiting so patiently
But I’ll wait for the truth
